title: Instacart Grocery Price Index
description: Scrape grocery prices from Instacart categories for price comparison and market analysis. Supports JSON API extraction with HTML fallback.

startUrls.title: Start URLs List
startUrls.description: Multiple Instacart URLs to scrape (category pages, search results, or product pages).

category.title: Category ID
category.description: Instacart category ID for filtering products (e.g., 317 for fresh produce).

subcategory.title: Subcategory ID
subcategory.description: Instacart subcategory ID for more specific filtering.

searchQuery.title: Search Query
searchQuery.description: Search term to find specific products within categories.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Number of Products
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of products to collect per category or URL.

max_pages.title: Maximum Number of Pages
max_pages.description: Safety cap on the number of pagination pages to visit per URL.

extractDetails.title: Extract Product Details
extractDetails.description: If enabled, scraper visits individual product pages for detailed information including nutrition facts, ingredients, and reviews.

includeNutrition.title: Include Nutrition Information
includeNutrition.description: Extract nutrition facts and dietary information when available.

includeReviews.title: Include Review Counts
includeReviews.description: Extract customer review counts and ratings.

storeId.title: Store ID
storeId.description: Filter results to a specific store on Instacart.

zipcode.description: Zipcode for location-based pricing (prices may vary by region).

dedupe.description: Remove duplicate products by ID, URL, or name.

delay_ms.description: Delay between requests in milliseconds for stealth mode.
